casebody.data:
ROUSE
v.
FORSYTH COUNTY DSS 1P19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 14, 2019 Gloria L. Woods, Assistant County Attorney, for Forsyth County Department of Social Services. *41Benjamin P. Winikoff, Attorney at Law, for Rouse, Teressa B.

Gloria L. Woods.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th of January 2019 by Respondent to Stay Reinstatement of Employee:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of January 2019."
